net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale

Class LocalizedTextHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale.LocalizedTextHelper

  • public class LocalizedTextHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for code returning LocalizedText such as OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject properties.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
